import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css' import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../assets/css/font-awesome.css' import next from '../assets/images/next.svg' import phone from '../assets/images/mail_white.svg' import landing from '../assets/mockups/autogroceries_home.png' import ReactTypingEffect from 'react-typing-effect' import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; export class Section1 extends Component { render() { return (

Cross Platform Development

We are a full service Web Design and Development agency based in Toronto, Canada. We specialize in transparency with our clients throughout the entire process, from initial consult to final deployment and beyond. Please schedule a call below if you're interested in our services.

Contact Us View Portfolio
) } } export default Section1
